ubs-homepage.general: Convenient pick up service from UBS provides fast garbage collection

pick-up-city.title: PICK UP city is a digital waste sorting service.
pick-up-city.content: Suitable for anyone who wants to sort without leaving home and get their own sorting statistics.

courier.title: What can be given to the courier?

content.li_1.2: everything is the same that the UBS sorting station accepts for recycling or safe incineration, waste for recycling and incineration can be put in one bag - we will sort everything for you
content.li_2.1: must be in a separate package -
content.li_2.2: rules for preparing textiles for delivery
content.li_3.1: we advise you to find a green bell container for glass in your area

price.title: The cost of the service
price.li_1: 1 bag with a volume of 120 liters with recycled materials and non-liquid plastics - UAH 280.
price.li_2: 1 bag of 60 liters with textile waste - UAH 220.
price.li_3: 1 bag of 20 liters with textile waste - UAH 110.

extraoffer.title: In addition to packages, the courier can pick up an unlimited number of extra items (except styrofoam) for FREE, these are:
extraoffer.condition: ☝️ provided that they are clean, dry and collected in SEPARATE bags or bags

items.li_3: PET bottles are transparent from under drinks
items.li_5: Styrofoam (restriction - we pick up one bag of 120 l for 1 delivery free of charge)

conditions.title: You can give the above extrapositions to the courier free of charge by fulfilling simple conditions:
conditions.item_1: When ordering the service, indicate that you plan to give the courier free extrapositions, and indicate their number.
conditions.item_2: Fold each type of packaging separately. A mix of these wastes in one bag/box will not be picked up by the courier. Tie each bag tightly.

minimum-volume.title: Minimum volume for export:
minimum-volume.li_2: 20 packages of 120 liters in the suburbs within 20 km of Kyiv

error.exist-address: This address has already been added

add-new-certificate.title: Add sertificate
add-new-certificate.сertificate-field-format: The field can contain only numbers in format хххх-хххх
add-new-certificate.duration-field-format: The field can contain only numbers from 1 to 12
add-new-certificate.discount-field-format: The field can contain only numbers in format from 1 to 999
